ygData.subject: Re: The Battle Ends, and the Carnage Begins
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine holds up his claws crossing them into an X, the energy field it produces blocks the missles from Dark one. the recoil pushed him back skidding his

Received: from pavilion (A010-0165.ELRA.splitrock.net [209.156.146.165]) by pimout1-int.prodigy.net (8.11.0/8.11.0) with SMTP id eBIMP7a34048 for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Mon, 18 Dec 2000 17:25:08 -0500

Subject: Re: The Battle Ends, and the Carnage Begins
Date: Mon, 18 Dec 2000 17:22:23 -0800
Organization: Prodigy Internet
MIME-Version: 1.0

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lunarpine holds up his claws crossing them into an X, the energy field it
produces blocks the missles from Dark one. the recoil pushed him back
skidding his footprints where he stood. "Do you mind, this is a private
battle." Lunarpine puts his attention back on Serpentor flashing his claws
in a challenge to the snake.
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, December 17, 2000 5:50 PM
Subject: The Battle Ends, and the Carnage Begins


> (As I said in an earlier e-mail, sorry about the lateness of this e-mail,
but
> I had a long power outtage.  Happens quite frequently during the winter
> unfortunately.  I lost all the e-mails I read, so I'm just going by
memory.
> Sorry if it's a little off, I'm also not up-to-date on events in the
battle)
>
>
> The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Double
>
Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Ares/Serpentor/Unitron/Chordate/Caitiff/
> Shockwave/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:
>
>
>
>
>
>
> Dark One barell rolled, dodging numerous blasts, an EMP shot hitting the
tip
> of his left wing.  Fortunately, that part of his form was entirely
useless,
> at least in the ways of circuitry and such.  He fired off two
> energy-signature seeking missiles off at Lunaprine, who was attacking
> Serpentor.
>
> ---
>
> Breakdown fired off another explosive shell from his artillery form at Hot
> Rod.
>
> ---
>
> Pyro fired off three fireballs at the CF.
>
> ---
>
> Hiss fired off three fusion cannons, taking out an EMP cannon, autogun
fire
> raking across his body and causing him to fall to his knees.
>
> ---
>
> Scavenger fired off twenty-five explosive rounds at Angel Prime.
>
> ---
>
> Sixshot's underbelly got hit with a blast, and he began to head straight
for
> the ground.  He pulled up a little, firing off two missiles at the CF, one
> taking out three autoguns, the other blowing up against the shields.
>
> "Gotta, make this, count." Sixshot yelled, transforming in mid air,
slamming
> to the ground on his treads, the sides of the treads covered in heavy
armor
> so they couldn't be simply shot.  He armed his cannon with laser energy.
>
> ---
>
> Demon Wulf fired off a missile blade at Angel Prime from his sword, the
blade
> quickly replaced as autogun fire raked over his legs, but causing little
> damage.
>
> ---
>
> Dark Claw fired off two missiles from his attack vehicle form at Depth
> Charge.  An EMP blast hitting an unimportant part of his body.
>
> ---
>
> Flesh Ripper fired off ten red rapid optic blasts at Angel Prime's left
knee,
> charging forward at the enemy.
>
> ---
>
> Manterror kept his momentum, speeding up as an EMP blast nearly struck
him,
> he pulled up, dodging (Lunaprine's character, don't know name)
unwittingly,
> but still didn't know (Lunaprine's character) was there.  He fired off two
> more ion disks, each penetrating into the chest of Caitiff.
>
> ---
>
> Double Punch walked around in his stealth mode, looking for a target.
>
> ---
>
> Injector flew at the CF, firing off ten rapid optic blasts, followed by
six
> stinger missiles, three from each weapon, all heading towards the
> Cybertornian Fire.
>
> ---
>
> Bumblebee caught an autogun blast into his chest, which surprisingly
pierced
> into his body.  He raised both stinger missile launchers, firing off two
> missiles each, the autogun blowing apart.
>
> ---
>
> Ares swerved his turret to face the Cybertronian Fire, firing off four
> powerful blasts from each of his cannons (sixteen shots in all) at the
> massive warship.
>
> ---
>
> Serpentor yelled as Lunaprine tackled him, but the Alliance warrior kept
his
> wits and fired off an optic blast at Lunaprine's face, and brought out his
> energy blade from subspace in his left hand, but kept it deactivated.
>
> ---
>
> Nemesis Enforcer flew through the air like a bat out of hell.
Coincidently
> in his giant bat mode.  The wings pulled back, numerous changes going on
> through his body, the winged biped form of Nemesis now apparent, a missile
> launcher launching off a rocket at the Maximal warship.
>
> ---
>
> Scattershot touched to the ground, raising his rifle, looking around for
any
> targets.
>
> ------
>
> Chordate sighed as Kluster left without replying.  He pressed a few
buttons,
> bringing the missile launchers online.  All five of them.  He pressed
another
> button, firing off a single missile from each launcher.
>
> ------
>
> Unitron hovered in his space fighter mode, when his sensors detected
activity
> in the missile launchers of the Cybertronian Fire.  He activated his laser
> weaponry and charged forward at full speed with his engines blazing.
>
> "Perfect." he said to himself, followed by a chuckle.  He saw one of the
> missiles coming out, and he instinctively fired off twenty-five rapid
laser
> blasts, the blasts intercepting the missile before it even left the
missile
> tube.
>
> ------
>
> Chordate's scanner readings of the shields at 54% changed into a big red
> "WARNING: EVACUATE BRIDGE IMMEDIATELY" the flashed and played over and
over
> again.
>
> "What the...?"
>
> Unknown to Chordate, the missile in Missile Tube Three exploded before it
> even left the tube, and as a new missile was being armed only five feet
> behind it.  As the first missile exploded from Unitron's laser blasts, the
> resulting explosion setting off the other missile, soon taking out the
entire
> missile launcher and blowing a small hole that was only 5 X 5 ft in
diamter
> in the side of the Cybertronian Fire.
>
> Chordate let out a yell as the main control panel of the CF glowed a
bluish
> white for a second, then exploded, the resulting flames and scrap metal
> digging into the Maximal's face.  Chordate let out a scream of pain and
fell
> backwards in his feet, rolling all over the floor screaming, mech-fluid
> leaking from his face over his hands.  He knew at least one optic sensor
had
> been destroyed, and may have been so irreversably.  But he continued to
> scream in agony, hundreds of tiny metal and glass pieces stuck in his
face.
>
> -------
>
> Caitiff jumped, but to no avail.  The ion disks pierced in his chest, and
cut
> through his spark.  As the ion disks came into contact with his spark, the
> explosion from the inside ripped him apart, killing him almost instantly.
>
> =====
>
> Shockwave's long range scanners detected a battle at the ice continent of
> Antarctica.  He transformed into his space fighter mode, activating his
> engines and blasting full speed for the site of battle at Antarctica from
the
> large island continent of Australia.
>
>
>
>
